episodes.title: Jury Watch in the Trial Against "Cult Mom" Lori Vallow Daybell | Crime Alert 7AM 06.12.25
episodes.description:
The jury has begun deliberations in the trial of Lori Vallow Daybell, who is representing herself against charges of attempted murder in the 2019 shooting of her former nephew-in-law, Brandon Boudreaux.
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: "Orgasm Cult" Leaders Guilty of Coercing Women into Sex Acts | Crime Alert 2PM 06.10.25
episodes.description:
Two women behind a controversial sex-focused wellness company are found guilty in New York for coercing employees into unpaid labor and sex acts. A Utah judge rules a 67-year-old death row inmate with dementia is competent to be executed, clearing the way for the state to seek a firing squad execution. Drew Nelson reports.
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: "Sex Cult" Leaders Found Guilty in Forced Labor Trial
episodes.description:
After a month-long trial, a jury delivered its verdict in the case against the founder and former head of sales of OneTaste, a company that promoted the practice of orgasmic meditation. Nicole Daedone, 57, the founder, and Rachel Cherwitz, 44, the former head of sales, were found guilty of forced labor conspiracy charges.
See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

episodes.title: Crime Alert 8AM 12.13.24| Mom Who Stabbed Baby to Death in Cult Murder Sentenced
episodes.description: 13-mo-old Hannah Driver was stabbed to death by her mother, Chloe Driver. The cult mother has been sentenced to life in prison. See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
